data.text: @HistoricEngland @unisouthampton @Cambridge_Uni @UniOfSurrey That quote clearly demonstrates why you don't connect with the general public! What does it mean? Why use the convoluted phrase 'public wellbeing need'? Jeesh
@HistoricEngland @unisouthampton @Cambridge_Uni @UniOfSurrey Haven’t they all been demonised by the woke in the universities yet !!!

@HistoricEngland @unisouthampton @Cambridge_Uni @UniOfSurrey ...like, er, going for a walk in the fresh air, you mean, a bit more often than usual, because the other options are temporarily unavailable? Cripes! Who would have thought such a thing could even happen. Can I have my £30k research cheque now?
